MEMORANDUM
April 26, 1957
TO: NAEB OFFICERS & DIRECTORS
CC: COMMITTEE CHAIRMEN, HARRY J. SKORNIA
FROM: Burton Paulu, President
(1) A reminder of the announcement I sent you on March 7s "The
NAEB Board of Directors will meet in the Deshier-Hilton Hotel in
Columbus at 8:00 p.m. on the evening of Monday, May 6. There also will
be morning, afternoon and evening sessions on May 7* I hope you can
all be present at all sessions.‚Äù
If we can complete our business in time to have Tuesday evening
free, we shall do so; but since we only have two meetings annually,
all members should reserve Tuesday evening for the Board, if necessary.
(2) Board Members and Committee Chairmen should send me by return
air mail their suggestions for the Board meeting agenda.
(3) If you have suggestions for the Thursday luncheon program
(which will be in the nature of short progress reports of general
interest), let me have those too.
(4) Vernon Bronson has invited officers, directors and headquarters
staff to a Region II dinner on Tuesday evening, May 7* If our schedule
permits, it would be nice to attend, although it is hard to foresee now
what stage we shall reach in our deliberations at that time.
